message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CL 

The paper deals with the recognition of handwritten Bangla isolated compound characters using a deep learning approach. This falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of layerwise training and RMSProp algorithm, which are commonly used in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) research. The paper also mentions the comparison of results with standard shallow learning methods and DCNNs, which are commonly used in information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL) research. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, and cs.CL, in that order.
